attributes.action: allow a permanent featue, marking the spot where (Eros's twin) Anteros's Arrow lands in Piccadilly Circus, as the romantic heart of London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long, London's most romantic place, the heart that Antreros pierced, has remained hidden under the pavements of Piccadilly Circus.  We the undersigned petition the government, and the city of London, to  allow a permanent memorial to be left on the pavement, marking this very special spot, by February 14th 2010.

rejection.details: Statues and memorials are not normally sponsored by central Government but usually result from private initiatives. The promoters of a statue or memorial can achieve their aims by setting up a Charitable Trust, identifying a site and commissioning a designer, raising the necessary finance and obtaining the appropriate consents from the relevant planning authorities.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
